title: A House Made of Stars
description: Sheâ€™s only ten years old, but she knows something is wrong with her father. Her mother says he just needs time to rest, to clear his mind. They must never question him. They must never call the police. "Greene's young narrator tells their story with intelligence and sensitivity and bravery...A thoroughly impressive work." - Kathy Fish, author of Together We Can Bury It
author: Tawnysha Greene
